thread.title: SpinifexIT Announces Release of Easy Reporter Version 2.12 for SAP and SuccessFactors HCM
thread.title_full: SpinifexIT Announces Release of Easy Reporter Version 2.12 for SAP and SuccessFactors HCM

author: AJ Whalen
title: SpinifexIT Announces Release of Easy Reporter Version 2.12 for SAP and SuccessFactors HCM
text:
SpinifexIT, the leading provider of business process enhancement solutions for SAP and SuccessFactors HCM announced the release of Easy Reporter 2.12, offering significant new performance, usability and data options. "Innovation is at the core of everything we do, and one way that we uphold this commitment is by constantly advancing and enhancing our solutions to meet the changing needs of our customers," said Darren Pithie, SpinifexIT Global CEO. SpinifexIT's solutions are the most robust in the industry and the increases in performance and usability contained in this release of Easy Reporter will benefit all of our SAP and SuccessFactors customers. We continue to invest in enhancements to our solutions that further reduce the time, eort and cost associated with a customer's most important SAP HCM and payroll activities."
Easy Reporter version 2.12 features a number of improvements to both HCM and payroll reporting, interface development and document generation, including:
Enhanced Reporting Performance
Easy Reporter's new release contains enhancements that improve the usability and performance of the world’s leading SAP HCM and Payroll reporting solution.
A new job splitting feature helps to reduce the run time of large reports by splitting the process into concurrent jobs before consolidating into a single report output. The result is faster processing times for many reports.
Dynamic New User Interface
The new release delivers new and updated features to its existing UI5 interface that improves report output, format and usability on browsers and mobile devices.
Powerful New Usability
Designing reports is even faster now that Easy Reporter allows users to quickly search for report fields by name or technical name.
Expanded Data Options
The addition of system fields will boost audit reporting by allowing you to include data about systems and activity in your reports.
About SpinifexIT
SpinifexIT is an SAP partner and global leader in the production of SAP-certified business process improvement software. SpinifexIT solutions increase a user’s ability to access and optimise their most important HR and Payroll data. With a global headquarters in Melbourne, Australia and regional offices in Atlanta, Charlotte, London, Singapore and Manila, SpinifexIT produces software solutions for SAP and SuccessFactors HCM & Payroll for companies all over the globe. Learn more about SpinifexIT’s solutions at http://www.spinifexit.com .
*SAP is a registered trademark of SAP AG in Germany and several other countries.
